verses.roman:
ei-mata pratidina prabhura vyavahāra
prabhu-kṛpā pāñā rūpera ānanda apāra

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; pratidina—daily; prabhura vyavahāra—the dealings of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; prabhu-kṛpā—the mercy of Lord Caitanya; pāñā—getting; rūpera—of Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī; ānanda apāra—unlimited happiness.
translation: In this way Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu's dealings with them continued every day. Thus receiving the transcendental favor of the Lord, Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī felt unlimited pleasure.
